title: Study Evaluating Single Ascending Doses of AAB-001 Vaccine SAD Japanese Patients With Alzheimers Disease
text:
Summary: Evaluate safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of single doses of the investigational AAB-001 Vaccine in Japanese patients with Alzheimer's disease.
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 Diagnosis of AD 

 Age 50-85 

 MMSE 14-26 

 Other inclusion criteria Apply 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 Significant Neurological Disease 

 Major Psychiatric Disorder 

 Clinically Significant Systemic Illness 

 Other
